name: rewind-ai
title: Control Rewind AI
description: Controls the Rewind AI application using Raycast.
author: johannes_m

commands.name: toggle-screen-capture
commands.title: Toggle Screen Capture
commands.subtitle: Rewind AI
commands.description: Toggle screen capture in Rewind AI

commands.name: toggle-audio-capture
commands.title: Toggle Audio Capture
commands.subtitle: Rewind AI
commands.description: Toggle audio capture in Rewind AI

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
